title: Error Rads After Last Patch
body:
(   USER)[20:46:42.889] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Riot Application Distribution System (c) 2010 Riot Games (version 1.0.0.228)
(   USER)[20:46:42.889] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Running at 20:46:42 on 08/16/2016
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.889] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Command line: "updateandrun lol_launcher LoLLauncher.exe"
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.889] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Executed from root folder with correct name, not an update.
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.889] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::HTTPConnection: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.889] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Connect: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.889] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: ("/releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe.version", "C:/Users/Riccardo/Documents/Game/League of Legends/RADS/temp\TMP2A9B.tmp", RETRY, 0x00000000)
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: perform request failed with code 6
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: Retrying after failed attempt 1
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: perform request failed with code 6
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: Retrying after failed attempt 2
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: perform request failed with code 6
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: Failed on /releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe.version
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Failed to download version information.
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Disconnect: ()
(  ERROR)[20:46:42.904] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: SelfUpdate failed.
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.904] RADS::User::ManagedFileHelper::Release: 
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.904] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Returning 0xc1e90004
(  DEBUG)[20:46:42.904] RADS::Common::ErrorMessageMap::ErrorMessageMap: locale: it_it
(   USER)[20:46:42.904] WinMain: Could not connect to the HTTP server.  Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.
 
This is the Rads log. I tried to find a solution on Internet but i didnt find it . So if someone have a solution it would be appriciated :D{{summoner:2}}

replies.body:
Hi, this is the italian board ^^
Try this guide: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
